description: These roasted eggplant stacks make a colourful and veggie packed starter or light lunch option.
name: Roasted Eggplant Stacks with Goats Cheese, Pesto & Capsicum Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 large eggplant, thinly sliced into discs

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. In a large bowl, toss the eggplant slices in half of the oil and lay them out on baking trays in a single layer. Roast for 10 minutes, add the roasted red capsicums and roast for 5 minutes.
Whisk the pesto and 2 tablespoons of lemon juice together in a bowl. Toss the rocket in a bowl with remaining lemon juice and oil.

Layer up the eggplant slices with roasted red capsicums, goats cheese, a drizzle of pesto and a little rocket, repeating until you have stacks. Serve with the remaining pesto, dressed rocket and toasted pine nuts.
